Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    The Parser class represents a tool used to parse the input. It supports multiple operations like: - isValid (String input) - validates the input - parseString (String input) - parses the String to List - formatTerm (String term) - applies a template over the specified term - decomposeTerm (String term) - gets a String and returns a Monomial - get/setVariable () - program supports usage of any variable name
    Author:
    Alexandru Bondor

      • parseString

        public boolean parseString(java.lang.String input)
        Takes an input String and parses it if String is valid. By parsing it, the private List poly is also built.
        Parameters:
        input - String to be parsed
        Returns:
        true if input parsed

        Returns:
